cleaned_text: Home / Tinctures / Hormonal Balance Tincture Hormonal Balance Tincture$29.99 - $89.99 Size Choose an option2 oz4 oz8 ozClear Hormonal Balance Tincture quantity Add to cart Description The herbs in this tincture support the endocrine system. The endocrine system balances and provides instruction for processes in your body, such as growth, metabolism, immune system function, reproductive health, and can even alter behavior. Regulating hormones can support the body's ability to help regulate sleep imbalances, PMS, acne, fertility challenges, libido, fertility, and mood swings. Our Hormonal Balance tincture is an essential support from puberty to peri-menopause, and beyond. Shake gently. Take 30-60 drops 1-4 times a day in a little juice or water, or take as directed. Contains Grain Alcohol, Spring Water, and Organic approximately 60% by volume. This product has not been evaluated by the FDA and is not intended to treat or prevent any illness or medical condition.
